videoDetails.Title: FREE Desmos Online Course
videoDetails.Description:
I'm thrilled to announce the launch of my first online course! The first 100 people to register using the coupon below can access the course on Udemy for FREE:
https://www.udemy.com/course/desmos-fundamentals/?couponCode=22495CDBAA1A5909F23D

You can also use my referral link to support the channel:
https://www.udemy.com/course/desmos-fundamentals/?referralCode=80EF9198E753626E3804

The Desmos graphing calculator is the best zero-cost math visualization software. It is used by students and teachers around the world but also by artists and programmers.

By the end of the course, you’ll be familiar with all of Desmos’ main features. You’ll be able to take advantage of this powerful technology to impress your friends, get better grades, draw cool designs, or be a better teacher.

This course assumes no prior knowledge. Desmos is super user-friendly compared to previous graphing calculators. Although math is NOT the focus of the course, you’ll probably learn a thing or two about math along the way.

In this class you'll learn:

- How to customize and share your visualizations
- How to use sliders to animate your graphs
- About all the different types of graphable expressions
- How to use lists, tables, and statistics
- How to use derivatives and integrals
